actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for navigation improvement of the Grays Harbor and Chehalis River and Hoquiam River, Wash.

summary.text: Modifies the project for navigation improvement of the Grays Harbor and Chehalis and Hoquiam Rivers in Washington to authorize additional work recommended by the Chief of Engineers, at an estimated cost of $47,730,000.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for navigation improvement of the Grays Harbor and Chehalis River and Hoquiam River, Wash.
